word_mean: (1)吸热的，收热的：如伴有吸热的化学反应，进行这类反应必须供热，即以势能的形式将热或能贮存起来。参见endoergic与exothermic

sentence.Network_en: At very high temperatures, more endothermic reactions play a role.
sentence.Network_cn: 在很高的温度下, 更多的吸热反应起作用.

sentence.Network_en: This process is endothermic with rapid carbon deposition and deactivation of the catalyst.
sentence.Network_cn: 此过程是吸热的,同时很快发生碳积沉并使催化剂活性减低.

sentence.Network_en: Is Hell exothermic ( gives off heat ) or endothermic ( absorbs heat )?
sentence.Network_cn: 地狱是散 发热量 还是吸收热量?
